item.description:
Ticki tocki ticki tocki! Hoy! Hoy! Hoy!

No, this is not an episode of the Man Show. It's time to try German food!

Our next meetup will be at Connecticut's authentic German restaurant, East Side. You've seen their billboard on Route 91, now it's time to check out the wiener schnitzel and biers.

www.eastsiderestaurant.com

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: A Taste of Germany--East Side Restaurant in New Britain
